statements: SELECT * FROM yoga_equipment_inventory;
SELECT product_name, price FROM yoga_equipment_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, price FROM yoga_equipment_inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM yoga_equipment_inventory WHERE quantity >= 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM yoga_equipment_inventory WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM yoga_equipment_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM yoga_equipment_inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM yoga_equipment_inventory WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, price FROM yoga_equipment_inventory WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, price FROM yoga_equipment_inventory WHERE price > 30 AND quantity < 10 ORDER BY price ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM yoga_equipment;
SELECT product_name, category FROM yoga_equipment WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM yoga_equipment ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM yoga_equipment JOIN inventory ON yoga_equipment.product_id = inventory.product_id;
SELECT * FROM yoga_equipment WHERE category = 'Mats' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM yoga_equipment JOIN inventory ON yoga_equipment.product_id = inventory.product_id GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, price FROM yoga_equipment JOIN inventory ON yoga_equipment.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM yoga_equipment;
SELECT product_name, category FROM yoga_equipment WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10);
SELECT * FROM yoga_mats;
SELECT mat_name, mat_color FROM yoga_mats WHERE mat_quantity > 0;
SELECT mat_name, mat_quantity FROM yoga_mats ORDER BY mat_quantity DESC;
SELECT mat_name FROM yoga_mats WHERE mat_color = 'Blue';
SELECT * FROM yoga_blocks WHERE block_quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM yoga_mats WHERE mat_color = 'blue';
SELECT mat_name, mat_quantity FROM yoga_mats WHERE mat_quantity > 10 ORDER BY mat_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(mat_id), AVG(mat_quantity) FROM yoga_mats;
SELECT block_name, block_size, block_quantity FROM yoga_blocks WHERE block_quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY block_quantity ASC;
SELECT strap_id, strap_length, strap_color FROM yoga_straps WHERE strap_length < 60 AND strap_quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM yoga_mats;
SELECT mat_name, price FROM yoga_mats ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT quantity, mat_name FROM yoga_mats WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM yoga_blocks WHERE color = 'blue';
SELECT block_name, quantity FROM yoga_blocks WHERE quantity < 5;
SELECT * FROM yoga_mats;
SELECT mat_name, quantity FROM yoga_mats ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT block_name, color FROM yoga_blocks WHERE color='Blue';
SELECT strap_name, length, material FROM yoga_straps WHERE length='6ft' AND material='Cotton';
SELECT i.item_id, i.quantity, m.mat_name, m.price FROM inventory i JOIN yoga_mats m ON i.item_id = m.mat_id;
SELECT * FROM yoga_mats;
SELECT brand, color FROM yoga_blocks WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, brand, size FROM yoga_mats ORDER BY size DESC;
SELECT * FROM yoga_straps WHERE brand = 'Gaiam';
SELECT customer_id, item_id, quantity FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM yoga_mats;
SELECT id, brand, color FROM yoga_blocks ORDER BY brand DESC;
SELECT color, size, quantity FROM yoga_straps WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT customer_id, item_id, item_type, quantity FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
